about_the_game:
After experiencing the golden age of the Vikings and conquering many places, while the tired people were resting after the war to do their own work, a young Viking who came to avenge his family who were killed in the wars and sought justice raided their city.

  This DLC also offers a gaming experience where you defeat enemies using old-style weapons such as bows, crossbows, axes, and swords in a way that is appropriate for the Viking era.

   You play as the main character who wants to avenge his family during the golden age of the Vikings and you progress by finishing off the Vikings, there is a different Viking city in each section, as a developer we wanted to reflect that period as much as we could with the means we had, if we were successful this will make you happy and you will have enjoyable hours.
